title: Probabilistic Predictions With Gaussian Process Classification
description: In this lab, we will explore Gaussian Process Classification (GPC) with an RBF kernel and different choices of hyperparameters. We will generate data, train the GPC model with both fixed and optimized hyperparameters, and plot the posteriors and the log-marginal-likelihood landscape. We will also evaluate the accuracy and log-loss of the model.
